documentation.text:
@dev claim Alpha token by burning shares (get less because of withdraw premium)
 @param _share the number of shares to burn and claim Alpha

@dev recover left-over Alpha token. Must only be called from owner
 @param _amount the number of Alpha token to withdraw

@dev update withdraw portion parameter
 @param _withdrawPortion the new withdraw portion parameter

@dev claim Alpha token by burning shares (get less because of withdraw premium)
 @param _share the number of shares to burn and claim Alpha

@dev recover left-over Alpha token. Must only be called from owner
 @param _amount the number of Alpha token to withdraw

@dev update withdraw portion parameter
 @param _withdrawPortion the new withdraw portion parameter

devdoc.author: Alpha Implements Alpha escrow contract. Whenever you withdraw, you pay withdraw premium to other existing users who have not withdrawn yet.

params.amount: the amount of Alpha token to accumulate
params.share: the shrare that the user receives

params.amount: the amount of Alpha token that the user receives
params.share: the shrare that the user burns

params._amount: the amount of Alpha token to accumulate

claim(uint256).details: claim Alpha token by burning shares (get less because of withdraw premium)

params._share: the number of shares to burn and claim Alpha

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recover(uint256).details: recover left-over Alpha token. Must only be called from owner

params._amount: the number of Alpha token to withdraw

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Alpha escrow contract.
